name: Alma de Gato
description: Alma de Gato has a preference for taking unbaptized and very rude children. In his firebird form he usually releases sparks. they say that its fire does not carbonize but electrifies the person, because instead of feeling something burning in his body, it will be as if he had received a shock. When this bird dies its body turns into a plant of the same name, whose tea from its leaves can cure any deep sadness, due to its magical effect.<Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
